member.name: EMRSETVIEWPORTORGEX
member.summary: The EMRSETVIEWPORTORGEX,EMRSETWINDOWORGEX, and EMRSETBRUSHORGEX structures contain members for the SetViewportOrgEx, SetWindowOrgEx, and SetBrushOrgEx enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMRSETVIEWPORTORGEX.emr
member.summary: Base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRSETVIEWPORTORGEX.ptlOrigin
member.summary: Coordinates of the origin. For EMRSETVIEWPORTORGEX and EMRSETBRUSHORGEX, this is in device units. For EMRSETWINDOWORGEX, this is in logical units.
